text:
In light of evidence confirming higher risk, we’ve produced an #EasyRead guide for people who have a #LearningDisability to contact their GP and ask for the #COVID19 #vaccine in JCVI Priority Group 6, + resources for family carers.

You can find them here: https://t.co/RFu0ESaEFa https://t.co/hOpTyNlRmh
